desc: New Science to solve foot pain. Fix flat feet and plantar fasciitis. Based on 150 clinical studies and leading scientists at Harvard's Spaulding Running Center - this technology can fix flat feet, foot pain and plantar facitiis and numerous other joint improvements.

layout.text: Achy feet, Flat Feet, Plantar Fasciitis, Shin Splints, Ankles, Knees, Hip and Back Pain
